attributes.action: Allow income tax relief on the payment of private school fees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Part of everybodys income tax is used to fund the state education system. By opting out of the state education system and sending ones children to a private school, individuals are effectively paying twice for the same service. Tax relief should be granted on the tuition fees to make this situation more equitable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
